description:
More expression. More color. More artist collaborations. This season, we’ve partnered with unique artists and storytellers to create Merino wool socks and apparel saturated with inspiration. Now you can take the art of the outdoors with you wherever you go.

Step out in style this ski season with the Women's Ski Targeted Cushion Print OTC Socks. Featuring the bold and folksy design of New Mexico artist Jaime Molina. Plus, our most advanced Indestructawool™ technology for enhanced durability, our 4 Degree™ elite fit system for an unmatched performance fit, and body-mapped mesh zones for added breathability. These one-of-a-kind Merino ski socks are exactly what you need to go far and feel good
name: Smartwool Ski Targeted Cushion Canada Print Over The Calf Socks - Mens

specs.value: 57% Merino Wool, 10% Nylon, 30% Recycled Nylon, 2% Elastane, 1% Polyester
